title: Stylish Burleigh Heads Beachfront Getaway on the Gold Coast
description: Soak up the Gold Coast sunshine on a laidback escape to the gorgeous Burleigh Heads, staying in a stylish beachfront apartment at Ambience on Burleigh Beach, a collection of contemporary self-catering apartments, perfect for families and couples alike, with a resort-style pool and spa. While the One-Bedroom Apartment is perfect for couples, larger groups can upgrade to convenient Two or Three-Bedroom Apartments. Included in your escape is a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, an unlimited in-house movie package, free Wi-Fi, secure parking and a guaranteed late 12pm check-out.

title: Gold Coast Beachfront Apartments
description:
Spectacular ocean-kissed coastlines and year-round sunshine await on an escape to Burleigh Esplanade Apartments - a family-friendly property perfectly positioned on the glorious golden sands of Burleigh Beach. The property features complimentary access to a heated swimming pool, spa, sauna, tennis court, gym and an enviable location in the heart of it all - Burleigh. Nestled between the North Burleigh Surf Club and Burleigh Heads Surf Club, let Burleigh Esplanade Apartments be your launchpad as you discover one of the city’s most laidback precincts, where trendy bars, restaurants, art galleries, and bohemian, surf-inspired boutiques sit alongside ultra-cool breweries and mouth-watering burger joints. 

Spend your days exploring beachfront fine-dining restaurants or taste your way through the healthy-living eateries on James Street, then lie back on your beach towel and let the sound of the waves wash over you.

title: Elegant Gold Coast Suites & Apartments with Onsite Pool Club & Wellness Spa
description:
Soaked in sunlight and just steps from the surf at Burleigh Beach, this elegant coastal retreat blends crisp modern design with the laidback rhythm of one of Australia’s most iconic beach towns.

Inside, its studios, suites and apartments are light and airy with coastal-inspired design that echoes its surrounds. Spend long afternoons at Haven Pool Club with a drink in hand and fresh seafood on the table or ease into an Italian feast at LiTO, the hotel’s welcoming all-day trattoria.

Between ocean dips and DJ-backed sunsets, guests can unwind at the cutting-edge CIEL Spa with a treatment or dip in the magnesium pools, or simply take in Burleigh's pine-lined streets, pristine beaches and buzzing cafes.
offer_address: 3 First Avenue, Burleigh Heads, Queensland 4220, Australia
